page.title: 09DEVIZES SCHOOL AS IT WAS.
page.content: School life in Devizes at the beginning of the 20th Century,as told by Mr.Ray Smith. At the age of eight Mr. Smith started school. His elder sister had been teaching him before this. Mr.Smith's first school was called Parnella School and it stood on the edge of the market place, where the Co_op supermarket is now. Mr.Smith was taught the Three R's, Geography, History, Art and Singing. They also had an exercise called 'Back Stick' when they had to walk around with a stick to help their posture. On Thursday, Mr.Smith could look onto the market where he could see livestock being sold and a fire_ eater performing tricks. As Mr. Smith lived at Coate he had to walk three miles to school and the same back again each day. {(See also page 10.)}
